text: Patrick Carney Michelle Branch Michelle Branch has announced her engagement to The Black Keys drummer Patrick Carney. The pair began dating will working on Branch ’ s recent album, Hopeless Romantic, which Carney produced. This summer they ’ ll tour together in support of the album. Carney popped the question on Sunday night as Branch celebrated her 34th birthday. “ Thank you for all the birthday love and wishes. Last night, right before I blew out my candles, [ Carney ] asked me to marry him and then I had nothing left to wish for, ” she wrote on Instagram. “ 34 might be the best year yet. ”
